title: Shay Mitchell enjoys a mom's night out at Drake's 33rd birthday party days after giving birth
text:
She announced the birth of her first child via her Instagram page on Sunday.

And Shay Mitchell and boyfriend Matte Babel enjoyed a well-earned parents' night out as they hit the town to party at Drake's star-studded 33rd birthday bash at Goya Studios in Hollywood on Wednesday.

The Pretty Little Liars star, 32, shared video to Instagram showing the couple dancing at the event and captioned it simply: 'Parents.'

'Parents': Just days after giving birth to her first child, Shay Mitchell shared video to Instagram showing her dancing with boyfriend Matte Babel at Drake's 33rd birthday party Wednesday

Mitchell mingled with A-listers such as Adele, French Montana, Diddy and Chris Brown at the party.

A source told UsWeekly Thursday: 'Shay looked absolutely amazing, definitely not like she had just given birth.'

'She was dancing and living her best life, and her and Matte were having so much fun together,' the source added.

Party time: The former Pretty Little Liars star, 32, showed off her cleavage in a low-cut sleeveless black dress as she joined A-listers including Adele, Chris Brown and Diddy

'Never letting go': Mitchell announced the birth of her baby girl on Sunday with a sweet photo of the little one's hand clasped around her finger

Mitchell shared her baby news Sunday by posting a photo of her baby daughter, dressed in a stripy onesie, grasping one of her fingers with her tiny hand.

'Never letting go...,' she wrote alongside the sweet snap.

Later on Sunday night, she went on to share a video account of her 33-hour labor in which she's seen in her hospital bed hooked up to monitors.
description: The Pretty Little Liars star, 32, enjoyed a well-earned night out as they hit the town to party at Drake 's star-studded 33rd birthday bash at Goya Studios in Hollywood on Wednesday.
